overview: Two cab drivers, a female driver on an airport taxi and a male driver on a 'black and yellow' taxi for the poor confronts two strange passengers on their nutty shifts. The promiscuous male passenger has all confidence to hit on the young and beautiful female driver. He recites poetry, he comments on the millennials and their music tastes and what not to get the attention of the desperate looking young girl. The girl gets a menstrual pain which changes the direction of the whole journey. The female passenger in the second cab is on a run to make a ransom amount to save her marriage has her ex boy friend has threatened her to leak her videos. The male driver realizes the potential of the situation and helpless looking woman. He conspires with his room mate on phone to utilize the unexpected golden opportunity.
title: Love in a Taxi
